titles.title: A bill to include Livingston County, the city of Jonesboro in Union County, and the city of Freeport in Stephenson County, Illinois, to the Lincoln National Heritage Area, and for other purposes.
Abraham Lincoln National Heritage Area Amendment Act
Abraham Lincoln National Heritage Area Amendment Act

Abraham Lincoln National Heritage Area Amendment Act
Abraham Lincoln National Heritage Area Amendment Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held.

calendar.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Murkowski without amendment. With written report No. 115-224.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 372.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
Abraham Lincoln National Heritage Area Amendment Act
This bill amends the Consolidated Natural Resources Act of 2008 to add Livingston County, the city of Jonesboro in Union County, and the city of Freeport in Stephenson County in Illinois to the Abraham Lincoln National Heritage Area.
